alert.note: Alert for South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 08 at 9:08PM MDT until May 09 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...The Mountains of Summit County, the Mosquito Range, and the Indian Peaks. The strongest winds will be over the ridges and in areas favored by south to southwest winds, including Summit County and Georgetown. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines and cause power outages. Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Secure loose objects and be prepared for power outages. Consider delaying travel in light or high profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: South and Southeast Grand, West Central and Southwest Boulder, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Summit, North and West Park Counties Above 9000 Feet
